article_title: Healthcare Access For Wine Workers, Top To Bottom

article_metadata.description: The second in our series about access to healthcare for the workforce of Napa Valley. Today we look at Trefethen Family Vineyards, which provides full coverage for each of its 110 employees.
article_metadata.author: Cathy Huyghe
